attributes.action: When the UK comes out ‘lockdown’ make the next working day a bank holiday.
attributes.additional_details: We need to rejoice and show support for the hospitality industry.
attributes.background: With the strict measures we are all abiding by, for the sake of ourselves, and fellow people. I think, when all is good, and clear and it will be. We need to celebrate. We need a national holiday.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304513

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
